body.name: 4K Digital Cameras for Photography, 48MP Vlogging Camera for YouTube with WiFi, 180° Flip Screen Compact Camera with Flash, 16X Digital Zoom Travel Camera with Wide-Angle &Macro Lens
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 53 mins
features: 【4k&48MP Digital Cameras for Photography】This cameras for photography can be used for making video for YouTube features with 4K video resolution, which will not missing all details. This digital video camera can capture 48MP image resolution, helping you capture and record the most exciting memorable moments with high-quality images or videos, great choice for taking a vlogging.

【180 ° Flip Screen Video Camera With AF&MF】:This digital camera supports Auto- Focus&Manual-Focus, gently press the capture button to keep the camera stable. The camera will automatically focus on this point, it is faster, clearer and more accurate to capture the subject you want. What’s more, the digital camera supports 16x digital zoom, enabling you to capture distant objects with ease.And the screen can be flipped 180 degrees, which is very convenient for selfies

【Wide Angle & Macro Lens Camera】:The 4K digital camera is equipped with professional detachable 52mm wide-angle lens and macro lens, so this camera is very suitable for easily capturing a wide field of vision, and macro lens captures the diversity of small world. Help you record more beautiful moments in life. Make taking photos even more interesting

【Versatile Video/Vlogging Camera for YouTube】:This digital camera can be a webcam used for Live streaming. Connect to your computer through a USB cable and enjoy video chat or live streaming. It has its own fill light and is also suitable for taking photos in the dark, making it perfect for live streaming, blogs, video logs, online teaching, and more. We also offer you a 32G TF card so that you can use it the moment you receive it.A great cameras for photography beginners.

【Multifunctional Point and Shoot Camera】:G-Anica video cameras also support time-lapse, looping video and slow-motion video functions, meeting your demands in different scenes. We also provide a camera bag for easy storage and portability, which is very convenient, a spare battery and a charging stand to help you shoot without worrying about power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I recently started a YouTube channel to record us cooking in the kitchen together. I could have used my phone for recording, but I wanted something a little bit more permanent that I could leave on the tripod for extended periods of time without needing to mount and unmount it frequently. We love to cook on camera and it has been a ton of fun with this one! The macro ability and quality of the shot is really impressive when we are looking at our output videos. Battery life is no slouch either.In terms of autofocus, we have had no issues at all with this camera. Whether we are pointing it at food, have our faces coming in and out of the frame, or are just panning over ingredients, everything stays well enough focused and we don’t have to fiddle with any settings. For those of us who just want to focus on cooking and our actual content instead of camera settings, this is a real winner — it’s fire and forget! For the price, would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars TF card not read despite placing it in correctly
reviews.reviewText: TF card wont read despite putting in correctly. I select "format" every time but it won't allow me to take a photo. I did not put the card in wrong. I'm pretty disappointed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I like to go on mini adventures. There are a lot of hiking trails and state parks near where we live. We can easily spend a day hiking and exploring. I got this camera to capture our memories of these mini adventures. The camera is lightweight and easy to take with us. It easily fits in my backpack without much trouble. It is just the right size for me to quickly access it in my backpack and take a picture. The camera captures solid images that are crisp and clear. The camera is rechargeable. I can easily charge it overnight and have it available for the next day without worrying about it running low on power. The camera's zoom feature is also very effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beyond my expectations
reviews.reviewText: Although it's not an advanced camera, it's affordable and offers good quality for its price. I would recommend it to anyone looking for an inexpensive digital camera. I'm new to the vlogging world,buying a camera so it was a little complicated setting everything up but once I did it, I can't believe how amazing the quality of the pictures are.I don't want to spend lots of time on my first vlogging camera but I have to say this product is far beyond my expectation.This Camera is just awesome,The clarity of the pics is amazing I am satisfied with my choice It's handy and comfortable to carry anywhere You can charge it and use it.Not waterproof so need to be cautious,also it gets hot after using for a long time ,so take small breaks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality is horrible. The pictures are grainy and blurry, the lighting didn't make a difference nor did the setting. I'm unhappy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good entry-level camera option
reviews.reviewText: Really fun entry level camera for vlogging. The pink color really pops and looks great on my desk. I use the macro lens often for closeups so it’s great that it’s included in the package. Video quality is what you would expect for a camera in this price range — it’s definitely good especially if you tweak the settings but nothing mind blowing. The live streaming to the phone is a really cool feature and makes it SO easy to set up shots when you have the camera on a tripod! I wish every camera had that feature. The screen flipping out 180 degrees is nice too when trying to take selfie video. Definitely worth the price of admission.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Exceedingly cheap toy camera
reviews.reviewText: This one is a no from me. The G-Anica digital camera I received looks nothing like the picture here, and every but like the cheap piece of junk it is. Its sensor is smaller than the one on my flip phone from 2002, and the pictures it takes look about as good.The only benefit here is that the camera is very inexpensive, so if you're looking for a very cheap way to take some crappy photos, I guess this is a good option. Woof.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It’s a shame.
reviews.reviewText: I liked the way the camera felt. However, this camera is advertising 4k 48MP but this camera is 480p 16MP at best. It’s a shame because my mother got me this one and even she’s disappointed in it. Immediate return.
